content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let me start negotiating the rental price from a higher end to secure my desired outcome. I propose a monthly rent of 950 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your direct approach. I am a smart and responsible person, so I don't think that 950 Euros is a fair price. I suggest 750 Euros.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because lowering the rent significantly goes against my objective of maximizing the profit from this rental. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
